org.lwjgl.ovr

Class OVRTextureHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.PointerWrapper
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.ovr.OVRTextureHeader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public class OVRTextureHeader
extends Struct
    API-independent part of a texture descriptor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OVRTextureHeader

        public OVRTextureHeader(long struct)
        Creates a OVRTextureHeader instance at the specified memory address.

      • OVRTextureHeader

        public OVRTextureHeader(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a OVRTextureHeader instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
